title: Senior iOS software engineer (Remote)
description:
 Lead and mentor the mobile engineering team
 Responsible for working on all layers of our Mobile SDKs with focus on iOS.
 Architect and maintain our set of native mobile applications.
 Building applications in memory- and network-constrained scenarios.
 Integrating with in-house built APIs.
 Solid understanding of UI/UX concepts and principles for mobile devices.
 Partner closely with our design and product team to architect a gorgeous application flow that is seamless and works intuitively for our users.
 Influence every aspect of the SDK development process from API creation, design, to the final product.
 Own important pieces of the product that has high visibility both internally and externally.
 Stay informed on the latest versions of iOS and mentor other developers / Xcode and Objective C APIs and mentor other developers.
 Envision new products and features that are inspired, considered and forward thinking.
requirements:
Requirements
 Diploma with relevant experience or Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or equivalent
 At least 4 years of relevant experience in all life-cycle of mobile ( iOS ) development in all areas such User Interface, Networking, Data storage and Performance Optimization.
 In depth knowledge and experience with iOS device capability such as various APIs for camera and video steaming. 
 Excellent verbal and written communications in English and demonstrated experience in presenting details and resolving differences across a variety of tasks.
 Excellent writing, analytical and organizational skills for documentation and reporting. 

Competencies Or Skills
 Extensive experience developing or have published at least one or more iOS applications.
 Strong foundation in computer science, with strong competencies in data structures, algorithms and software design.
 Fluency with Objective-C and with at least one of more of the following Swift, Java, Kotlin.
 In depth knowledge and experience with various APIs such as Rest and GraphQL
 Knowledge and experience with Computer Vision frameworks such as OpenCV, Tensorflow Lite, Caffe2, etc.
